name: Budget Watch v0.21.5
body: Changes: - Update translations for Arabic, French, and Slovak. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/200) - Allow app backups. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/199)

name: Budget Watch v0.21.4
body: Changes: - Added and updated translations (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/186, https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/190)

name: Budget Watch v0.21.3
body: Changes: - Fix Spanish translations. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/176)

name: Budget Watch v0.21.2
body: Changes: - Add French translations (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/169) - Add Hungarian translations (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/173) - Update existing translations (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/172)

name: Budget Watch v0.21.1
body: Changes: - Add the following languages: - Spanish (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/150) - Estonian (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/162) - French (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/162) - Chinese (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/162) - Updated translations (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/162) - Prevent About dialog from disappearing when rotating the screen (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/160)

name: Budget Watch v0.21
body: This is release v0.21 of Budget Watch. Changes: - Add support for exporting data for a date range. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/146) - Add a time field to CSV exports which represents transaction times in the user's locale. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/146) - Update to SDK 27. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/147)

name: Budget Watch v0.20
body:
This is release v0.20 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Fix crash when importing certain types of corrupted CSV files. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/137)
- Support shortcut creation via launchers; remove support for adding shortcuts directly. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/138)
- Fix importing backups directly from the file system. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/139)
- Fix importing backups from certain types of content providers. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/139)

name: Budget Watch v0.19
body:
This is release v0.19 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Compile against Android SDK 27. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/133)
- Fix importing from a file manager on Android 24+. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/134)
- Provide metadata in Fastlane layout, to provide screenshots and other data for F-Droid. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/135)

name: Budget Watch v0.18
body:
This is release v0.18 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Add menu option to main screen which creates shortcuts on home screen for quickly adding an expense or revenue transaction. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/131)
- Round up any cents when calculating current budget values. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/130)

name: Budget Watch v0.17
body:
This is release v0.17 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Decrease time required to export data. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/125)
- Fix spinner width to entire field, affects adding/editing budgets and transactions. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/127)
- Support exporting data on Android 7+. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/128)
- Report correct mime type when exporting data. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/128)
- Fix bug where receipt images may not be sharable. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/128)

name: Budget Watch v0.16
body:
This is release v0.16 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Add progress feedback when importing/exporting. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/122)
- Add Dutch translations. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/123)

name: Budget Watch v0.15.2
body:
This is release v0.15.2 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Fix crash due to ProGuard removing SearchView, preventing the Transactions view from loading. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/121)

name: Budget Watch v0.15.1
body:
This is release v0.15.1 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:
- Auto-launch keyboard when adding or editing a transaction or budget. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/117)
- Capitalize first letter on some transaction and budget fields. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/118)
- Leave line number information when running proguard, so crash stack traces are usable. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/116)

name: Budget Watch v0.15
body:
This is release v0.15 of Budget Watch.

Changes/Improvements:

- Added static app shortcuts for quickly adding transactions from the home screen (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/113)
- Added a first startup wizard, giving guidance on how to use the app on its first load (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/98)
- Now using ProGuard, reducing the size of the APK (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/107)
- Context menu from transactions list has been removed, as it was unnecessary and buggy (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/114)

name: Budget Watch v0.14
body:
This is release v0.14 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:

- Add support for not assigning a budget to a transaction ([#76](https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/issues/76))
- Add Romanian translation (#101)
- Adopted a project privacy policy, available [here](https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/blob/master/privacy-policy.md).

name: Budget Watch v0.13
body:
This is release v0.13 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:

- Update layout when displaying budgets and transactions.
- Move save button for budgets and transactions to the action bar.
- Fix issue with updating transactions when phone is in a locale which uses a comma for a decimal point. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/issues/89)

name: Budget Watch v0.12
body:
This is release v0.12 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:

- Update icons used in application, to make them clear (not fuzzy) and easier to understand. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/81)

name: Budget Watch v0.11
body:
This is release v0.11 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:
- View layouts for budget and transactions have been improved and now use TextViews instead of EditViews. As a result, the text should be easier to read. Additionally, the text can now be selected with a long click. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/77)
- When using the search feature on the transactions view, previously when the search was closed the search results were still shown. This has been corrected, and closing the search now results in the previous transactions being shown. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/74)
- Various cleanup based on lint recommendations. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/75)

name: Budget Watch v0.10
body:
This is release v0.10 of Budget Watch.

Features/Improvements:
- The transactions view now has the ability to search. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/71)
- If a transaction has a note it is displayed along with the other summary information on the transactions view. (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/69)

name: Budget Watch v0.9
body:
This is release v0.9 of Budget Watch.

Features/Improvements:
- Import/Export improvements:
  - Able to send exported data after export is complete (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/64).
  - Able to import data using other installed applications, such as DropBox, Google Drive, or a file viewer (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/64).
  - Requests the necessary permissions when entering the Import/Export screen (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/64).
  - Added ability to import/export in JSON format (https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/issues/62, https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/pull/67).

name: Budget Watch v0.8
body:
This is release v0.8 of Budget Watch.

Features:
- Add confirmation dialog before deleting budgets and transactions.  https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/issues/53
- Allow exporting/importing budget/transaction information to/from a zip file; this also includes any captured receipt images.

Bug Fixes:
- Remove potential null reference dereferences.
- Close database connections when they are no longer needed.
- Perform expected back operation when clicking back arrow in action bar.

name: Budget Watch v0.7
body:
This is release v0.7 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:
- Add a total budget entry on the budgets screen. https://github.com/brarcher/budget-watch/issues/33
- Add a setting for configuring the JPEG quality for captured receipt images; the default value should provide a good balance between file size and image quality.

name: Budget Watch v0.6
body:
This is release v0.6 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:
- Improve layout padding on main view and transaction lists
- Prevent keyboard from appearing when viewing a transaction
- Launch add expense widget in a new task
- Only reload transaction list view if the transactions database was changed

name: Budget Watch v0.5.1
body:
This is release v0.5.1 of Budget Watch.

Improvements:
- The minimum SDK targeted is now 13

Bug fixes:
- Update German translation

name: Budget Watch v0.5
body:
This is release v0.5 of Budget Watch.

New features/improvements:
- Add ability to view a captured receipt and share it with another application
- An about dialog can be opened from the main screen, which gives details about the application and project on GitHub

Bug fixes:
- Display a Toast in all cases if an import/export of budget and transaction data fails
- Allow autocomplete for transaction names and accounts

name: Budget Watch v0.4
body:
This is release v0.4 of Budget Watch.

New features/improvements:
- Clicking on a budget will display all transactions for the budget
- Budgets and transactions can be edited by long-clicking
- A small receipt icon is now displayed next to each transaction with a receipt image captured

name: Budget Watch v0.3
body:
This is release v0.3 of Budget Watch.

New features/improvements:
- German translation
- Allow transaction description to be optional

Bug fixes:
- Resolve all issues identified by [FindBugs](http://findbugs.sourceforge.net/) and require all FindBugs issues be resolved prior to pull request acceptance
- Prevent budget option spinner from being reset when adding a new transaction then capturing a receipt
- Request camera permission dynamically for Android 6.0+

name: Budget Watch v0.2
body:
This is release v0.2 of Budget Watch.

New features/improvements:
- Widget now available for quickly opening to add an expense transaction
- An import/export may now be cancelled once started
- Add support for capturing a receipt with transactions and displaying them
- Add ability to purge all receipts older than a certain day, to help free space
- Performance improvements when loading the list of budgets and transactions

Bug fixes:
- Prevent screen rotation from clearing input fields for creating budgets and transactions
- Fix NPE when deleting a budget

name: Budget Watch v0.1
body:
This is release v0.1 of Budget Watch. It provides:
- Ability to add/update/remove budgets
- Ability to add/update/remove transactions, both expenses and revenues
- May view budget status over any arbitrary time period, defaulting on the current month
- May export/import budget and transaction information from/to CSV format (RFC4180).

Suggestions for improvements are welcome!
